map.name: Map
map.description: An old, worn map of the surrounding area. It might help you navigate.

effects.message: You study the map and get a better understanding of the area.

bread.name: Bread
bread.description: A fresh loaf of bread. It looks delicious and nutritious.

effects.message: You eat the bread and feel refreshed.

stick.name: Stick
stick.description: A sturdy wooden stick. It could be used as a simple weapon or tool.

effects.message: You grip the stick firmly, ready to defend yourself.

berries.name: Berries
berries.description: A handful of colorful berries. They might be edible... or not.

effects.message: You eat the berries. They taste sweet!

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: A flaming torch that provides light in dark areas.

effects.message: You light the torch, casting a warm glow around you.

gemstone.name: Gemstone
gemstone.description: A sparkling gemstone. It looks valuable.

effects.message: The gemstone catches the light beautifully.

rope.name: Rope
rope.description: A coil of strong rope. Useful for climbing or tying things.

effects.message: You secure the rope, making climbing much safer.

pickaxe.name: Pickaxe
pickaxe.description: A sturdy pickaxe. Perfect for mining or breaking through rocks.

effects.message: You swing the pickaxe with determination.

mushrooms.name: Mushrooms
mushrooms.description: Some wild mushrooms. They could be edible or poisonous.

effects.message: You eat the mushrooms, hoping for the best.

mountain_herbs.name: Mountain Herbs
mountain_herbs.description: Rare medicinal herbs found on the mountain. They might have healing properties.

effects.message: You consume the herbs and feel a surge of vitality.

ancient_coin.name: Ancient Coin
ancient_coin.description: An old coin with strange markings. It might be valuable to collectors.

effects.message: The ancient coin feels heavy with history.

hermit's_blessing.name: Hermit's Blessing
hermit's_blessing.description: A mystical blessing from the mountain hermit. It fills you with energy.

effects.message: The hermit's blessing fills you with renewed strength.

gold_coin.name: Gold Coin
gold_coin.description: A shiny gold coin. Standard currency in this realm.

silver_necklace.name: Silver Necklace
silver_necklace.description: A delicate silver necklace. It could fetch a good price.

effects.message: The silver necklace gleams in the light.

ancient_artifact.name: Ancient Artifact
ancient_artifact.description: A mysterious object from a long-lost civilization. Its purpose is unknown.

effects.message: The artifact pulses with mysterious energy.

magic_ring.name: Magic Ring
magic_ring.description: A ring imbued with magical properties. Its effects are yet to be discovered.

effects.message: The magic ring glows softly on your finger.

mysterious_potion.name: Mysterious Potion
mysterious_potion.description: A vial containing a strange, swirling liquid. Its effects are unknown.

effects.message: You drink the mysterious potion and wait to see what happens.

sword.name: Sword
sword.description: A well-crafted sword with a sharp blade. Useful for combat and self-defense.

effects.message: You draw the sword, feeling more confident in combat.

crystal.name: Crystal
crystal.description: A mysterious crystal that seems to pulse with inner light.

effects.message: The crystal resonates with magical energy.
